allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=nagaiku_password2024 psql -h localhost -U nagaiku_user -d nagaiku_budget -c "ALTER TABLE grants ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR DEFAULT ''active'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=nagaiku_password2024 psql -h localhost -U nagaiku_user -d nagaiku_budget -c "
\dt
SELECT ''transactions'' as table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''transactions'' AND table_schema = ''public''
UNION ALL
SELECT ''grants'' as table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''grants'' AND table_schema = ''public''
UNION ALL
SELECT ''budget_items'' as table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''budget_items'' AND table_schema = ''public''
UNION ALL
SELECT ''allocations'' as table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''allocations'' AND table_schema = ''public''
ORDER BY table_name, column_name;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=nagaiku_password2024 psql -h localhost -U nagaiku_user -d nagaiku_budget -c "
SELECT 
  t.id as transaction_id,
  t.description,
  a.amount as allocated_amount,
  bi.name as budget_item_name,
  bi.category,
  g.name as grant_name,
  g.status as grant_status
FROM transactions t
LEFT JOIN allocations a ON t.id = a.transaction_id
LEFT JOIN budget_items bi ON a.budget_item_id = bi.id
LEFT JOIN grants g ON bi.grant_id = g.id
WHERE a.id IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 5;
")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=nagaiku_password2024 psql -h localhost -U nagaiku_user -d nagaiku_budget -c "SELECT id, name, status FROM grants ORDER BY id;")
